content: Well then, I'll leave this <color=#8AAB4B>Sugar Figurine's Token of Thanks</color> with you!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Alright, looks like these turbulent currents will stick around for a while.
There should be plenty more flotsam to salvage,
I'll stay here and wait for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content: Yes! I want it!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Hmm... but before that,
let me find some inspiration
for sugar art in this place.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
So, would you like to save up for a bit more?
The drifting items get scattered along the shore by the turbulent waters.
If you can't find them, keep an eye out for unusual glimmers!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Oh right, don't worry too much about it.
The recycling value can be accumulated,
I'll keep track of it for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Oh? Want to save up for a proper thank-you gift?
Don't worry, the chaos will continue for a while longer,
I'll be right here waiting for you.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
*Ding!*—
Have you collected enough drifting items for an exchange?
Or would you like to trade in their recycling value for a reward?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
As for what you'll get,
Little Sugar made me promise—it's a secret!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Alright, let's see what these recyclables are worth!
Let me calculate...
One tael, two taels...
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
For every <color=#8AAB4B>2</color> pieces of driftwood,
I can recycle them and give you a reward in return.
So, come back to me when you're ready.
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Ah, since the sugar figures are naturally crafted,
the rewards inside
might be naturally crafted too~
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
It's because of my dedicated practice
that my sugar figurines look so lifelike,
not because I trapped real people inside them like some people think!
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
*Ding*—
Let me think back...
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
I've converted the recycling value you collected
into a sweet candy figure reward!
What do you say, would you like to accept it?
info: 随机任务-提交兑换-提提3_随机任务1

content:
Perfect! That's enough to exchange for a batch of recyclables!
And don't forget to come see me for your reward!

content: I want to give you a thank-you gift for the candy figurine!

content: I'll save up some more.
